description.narrative: Increase the efficiency of participating utilities, reduce their costs, enhance the reliability of their services and improve the quality of heat supply and finance technical assistance to the Ministry of Regional Development, Construction, Housing and Communal Services (Minregion), which will oversee the implementation of the project ; estimated 560 GWh/year energy savings, 5.26 MtCO2e GHG savings

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
